name: Okay. REMASTERED
description:
Remastered version of my GMTK 2020 Jam entry, "Okay."

The original: https://xascoria.itch.io/okay

Changelog: 
  • Complete rewrite of the core architecture
  • Rewrite of Maze format & Movement system
  • Rewrite level triggering system to be more dynamic
  • Implemented better UI navigation
  • Reworked tutorial
  • Removed some puzzles
  • Added new puzzles
  • Added new mechanics
  • Added support for AZERTY keyboard (Settings) (UNTESTED)
  • Added indicator for last pressed key (Settings)
  • Added Debug Mode (Settings)

This is likely going to be the final update the game will receive, thank you everyone for playing the game.
